Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Kujari invaded by Capellans In a surprising move, considering the existing war with the Canopian-Andurian alliance, at the beginning of this month, the Capellans sent a significant invasion task force towards [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Kujari],Kujari]]. Opposing them were the Black Widow Battalion mercenaries, whose combat abilities forced the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMarikFWLM],FWLM]] to the negotiation table when the latter attempted to invade Kujari and Wallacia last year in an attempt to bring them back into their fold.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: The invading force, unusually for such a large operation, consists solely of mercenary formations, all of them battalion-sized: [[DM.Factions[faction_LiaoC9],St. Cyr's Armored Grenadiers]], [[DM.Factions[faction_LiaoC13],McCrimmon's Light Cavalry]], Rivaldi's Hussars, and Steele's Eagles. After the initial attempt at tactical envelopment with Steel Eagles and Light Cavalry landing first and trying to engage and fix the Black Widow Battalion, Natasha Kerensky deployed her air assets, forcing the landing of the remaining two battalions. The two groups of invading mercenaries found themselves in positions where they could not support each other. However, through immediate aggressive actions of Steel Eagles and Light Cavalry, the lines of the Black Widow Battalion were pierced, and Natasha Kerensky chose to disengage at that point. At the moment of this news report, the Capellan mercenaries are eliminating or taking control of logistic and support points in order to prevent the Black Widow Battalion from waging the guerrilla war of the type they did when they ejected the FWLM from Kujari and Wallacia last year. This has been the CNB March broadcast.
